pageTitle: Patagonia Men's Classic Retro-X® Windproof Fleece Vest | Natural w/Navy Blue
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {3351=In 1993, we adopted fleece into our product line made from post consumer recycled (PCR) plastic soda bottles. We were the first outdoor clothing manufacturer to do so. PCR® clothing was a positive step towards a more sustainable system – one that uses fewer resources, discards less and better protects people’s health.}
